#text: Which are true regarding how Salesforce supports the sales process?

label.#text: Salesforce features include leads, campaigns, products, price books, opportunities, and quotes
Salesforce supports selling different items with different processes
Opportunity Teams can be used to allow a group of people working on a deal to be associated with an opportunity
Only contacts from the account related to the opportunity can be linked using contact roles
Team Selling can be used to attribute a percentage of success to influential campaigns

span.em: Contact Roles for opportunities track which contacts are related to the opportunity and the role they play. Contacts from other accounts can be linked to the opportunity using contact roles. It is a Customizable Campaign Influence and not Team Selling that is used to attribute a percentage of success to influential campaigns. Team Selling is a feature that allows members of an Opportunity team to work on a deal together and split generated commissions or revenue.

p.em: Salesforce standard objects which include Leads, Campaigns, Products, Price Books, Opportunities, and Quotes support different aspects of the sales process as a default. Different sales processes specific to the organization can also be configured for various types of products, product lines, or services. Lastly, the Opportunity Team can be configured to add multiple users to an Opportunity wherein each member of the team can be assigned roles and special access.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

div.#text: Please select 3 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: Dynamic Computing would like to be able to manage sales tasks differently between their computer system sales and computer accessories sales and display different fields for each. How can this requirement be met?

label.#text: Record Types
Formula Fields
Page Layouts
Workflow Rules

span.em: Record types allow different sales processes, picklist values, and page layouts to be displayed based on the profile of the current user.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

em.p: Workflow rules are configured to respond to record creation and updates. Formula fields are read-only fields on a record whose values are evaluated from a formula or expression.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Which of the following are valid considerations that a new developer should be aware of when developing in a multi-tenant environment?

label.#text: The number of API calls allowed is unlimited
Restrictions are enforced on code that can be deployed into a production environment
Governor limits ensure that the amount of CPU time is monitored and limited per customer over a defined time period to ensure that performance in one org is not impacted by another
Many customers share the same instance, so queries need to ensure the correct organization id is referenced to return the correct organizational data

span.em: Although many customers share the same instance, it is not possible for one customer query to return data from another customer. Each row in the table that stores application data includes identifying fields, such as the organization that owns the row (OrgID).

p.em: The total API requests (calls) per 24-hour period is limited for an org. Governor limits monitor and limit various factors such as CPU time and DML statements to ensure that one org does not impact another. Code cannot be deployed into production unless test code coverage is achieved.

#text: Describe the considerations when developing in a multi-tenant environment.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: A Salesperson wants to track customer preferences and product interests. How can the data structure required be achieved in Salesforce as per the MVC model?

label.#text: Creating Custom Visualforce pages
Workflow
Creating objects and fields
Validation Rules

span.em: In Salesforce, the data structure can be defined with objects and fields and sits in the model part of the MVC model.

#text: Describe how the Salesforce platform features map to the MVC pattern.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: Global Insurance would like users to be able to enter policy and advisor details on a screen. When a user clicks the 'Next' button on the screen, the advisor commission related to the details entered by the user should be displayed on the next screen. What would be the recommended solution for this requirement?

label.#text: Create a flow with Flow Builder
Create a Visualforce wizard
Create an approval workflow
Create a process with Process Builder

span.em: A flow can be used to create a wizard-like interface where details can be entered on one screen and a calculation displayed on the next screen.

p.em: Visualforce is not necessary as the requirement can be met by a declarative solution. Neither approval workflows nor Process Builder can be used for building interfaces.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: A service manager wants to send an email reminder to customers who have failed their energy audit to schedule another audit after they have completed the required modifications. They want this to be done weekly for all the records that still have a failed audit status. How can a Salesforce Administrator easily fulfill this requirement?

label.#text: Create a workflow to select the records with a failed audit status and associate a workflow action to send an email
Create a scheduled flow for the set of records that have a failed audit status to send an email
Create a process using Process Builder to select the records with a failed audit status and send an email reminder
Create a batch Apex for the records that failed the energy audit and schedule Apex to send the email

span.em: Using a scheduled flow, a set of records can be selected based on specified criteria. A send email action can be added to the flow to send an email reminder to customers who continue to have a failed audit status. This can also be done using Apex, using batch Apex to select the specific records and schedule Apex to send the email reminder. However, this is a more complex solution than using a declarative option such as flow. Processes and workflows only start when records are changed and can only send email alerts.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Cosmic Innovation is considering the use of the Lightning Component Framework to build a custom application for managing the company's products. Which of the following are valid capabilities of the framework that would be useful for understanding how to develop and provide access to the custom application?

label.#text: The framework provides two programming models for development, namely, Aura Components and Lightning Web Components.
The framework utilizes stateless client and stateful server, which improves efficiency and responsiveness.
The components built using the framework offer cross-browser compatibility but not device-awareness.
The components built using the framework can be added as custom tabs on the navigation bar.
The framework uses JavaScript on the client-side and Apex on the server-side.

span.em: The Lightning Component Framework is a UI framework that allows building single-page web apps with dynamic and responsive user interfaces in Salesforce. It uses JavaScript on the client-side and Apex on the server-side. Lightning components can be built using the Aura Components or Lightning Web Components model. They can coexist and interoperate on a page.

p.em: The framework offers features such as device awareness and cross-browser compatibility, allows using various out-of-the-box components for faster development, and enables customizing Lightning Experience and communities. It utilizes a stateful client (using JavaScript) and a stateless server (Apex). The client calls the server only when absolutely necessary, which results in fewer calls to the server and more responsive and efficient apps. Lightning components can be used in many different contexts. For example, they can be added as custom tabs in Lightning Experience and the Salesforce mobile app.

#text: Understand design frameworks, such as MVC architecture and Lightning Component framework, and how to build applications using both declarative and programmatic tools.

div.#text: Please select 3 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: What feature can be enabled to allow users to access social media information about the account and contacts they are interested in?

label.#text: Social Accounts, Contacts, and Leads
Social Media settings in Global Search
Social Media Network Search Tool
Twitter Search standard component

span.em: The Social Accounts, Contacts, and Leads feature adds social network information from Twitter and YouTube to records.

p.em: Global Search does not have a Social Media settings, nor is it capable of searching social media content. A 'Social Media Network Search Tool' does not exist. A Twitter Search component also does not exist. However, a Twitter component becomes available for displaying social media content from Twitter once the Social Accounts, Contacts, and Leads feature is enabled.

#text: If your company is selling only to businesses, which features of Salesforce would be used?

label.#text: Private Contacts
Person Accounts
Contacts
Business Accounts

span.em: When selling only to businesses, customer information is stored in Accounts. Accounts are the companies that business is done with and contacts are the people that work for them, and are related to the Accounts in Salesforce. Private contacts are contacts that are not related to an account and are only visible to the owner and the Salesforce admin.

#text: Which of the following capabilities are provided by the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema?

label.#text: Tracking sales deals and pipelines
Recording time spent on projects in timesheets
Recording customer feedback, problems or questions
Tracking prospective customers
Tracking customer invoices

span.em: Sales deals and pipelines are tracked in opportunities. Cases can track customer feedback, questions and problems. Leads track and record prospective customers.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

#text: Cool Air Conditioners has been using the Case object in Salesforce to manage issues faced by customers. The company would also like to use Salesforce to manage field service jobs performed for customers by technicians. They would like to track information about the tasks performed for the customers. What is the recommended solution to meet this requirement?

label.#text: Create an external field service application and use REST API to integrate it with Salesforce.
Utilize the standard objects Work Order and Work Order Line Item.
Create a custom object to manage field service jobs.
Install an AppExchange solution that adds the required functionality.

span.em: Two standard objects in Salesforce, namely, Work Order and Work Order Line Item, can be used to track the field service work performed for customers. A work order can have related work order line items that represent the subdivisions or tasks to be completed.

p.em: Installing an AppExchange application or creating a custom object is unnecessary to meet the requirement since standard objects are readily available. Creating an external application and integrating it with Salesforce is also not required.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

em.p: In orgs that don't have the Field Service add-on license, an option to enable Work Orders is available.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: What is true regarding Person Accounts?

label.#text: Person Accounts have the same fields as a business account
If Person Accounts are enabled, when creating an account, the type of account to create needs to be selected
Once Person Accounts are enabled they cannot be disabled
Person Accounts do not have an account hierarchy

span.em: Person Accounts once enabled cannot be disabled. When creating a new account, the type of account must be selected. The fields of a person account are made up of fields from the Account and Contact objects.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

div.#text: Please select 3 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: Because Apex runs in a multitenant environment, the Apex runtime engine enforces limits to ensure that Apex code or processes dont monopolize shared resources. What are valid examples of these limits?

label.#text: Time executing a SOQL query
Maximum number of records that can be stored
CPU time per transaction
Maximum execution time for a DML operation
Total number of records retrieved by SOQL queries

span.em: The runtime engine enforces limits of how long a SOQL query can run, how many records can be returned in a query and the maximum amount of CPU time a transaction can take. The maximum number of records that can be stored in an object is dependent on the storage available and is not subject to a governor limit.

p.em: Unlike SOQL queries, there is no maximum execution time for DML statements. There is, however, a limit for the total number of DML statements that can be executed in an Apex transaction.

#text: Describe the considerations when developing in a multi-tenant environment.

div.#text: Please select 3 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Cosmic Finance Solutions has recently switched to Lightning Experience. The Salesforce Administrator of the company would like to make use of Lightning components to enhance the user experience. Which of the following can be created using the Lightning App Builder?

label.#text: Custom page layouts
Custom record pages
Lightning tabs
Custom home pages
Single-page apps

span.em: App pages, record pages, home pages, and email application panes can be built using Lightning App Builder.

p.em: Page layouts can be created in the Object Manager page of an object. Lightning tabs can be created in the Tabs page in Setup.

#text: What are some considerations regarding using Leads in Salesforce?

label.#text: Opportunities must always be created from leads
When a lead is created, it can be automatically assigned to an owner
Leads can be individual consumers
When a lead is qualified, an account, contact, and opportunity are always created
Leads can be imported or created from an automatic process

span.em: When a lead is qualified and converted, either existing accounts and contacts are selected or new records are created. Creating an opportunity is optional.

p.em: Salesforce can be set up to assign leads to the right owners based on criteria after creation. Leads can be contacts that work for companies or individual consumers. They can be imported from a file or created from an automatic process such as web-to-lead.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

#text: Eric was told that Visualforce is part of the MVC paradigm. In this context, what does MVC stand for?

label.#text: Master Control Variable
Model Variable Controller
Master Class Variable
Model View Controller

span.em: Visualforce uses the traditional model-view-controller (MVC) paradigm, with the option to use auto-generated controllers for database objects, providing simple and tight integration with the database.

#text: Describe how the Salesforce platform features map to the MVC pattern.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: Which of the following are true regarding developing in the Salesforce multi-tenant environment?

label.#text: Salesforce delivers polyglot persistence transparently
The custom domain feature ensures that different customers do not access each other's data
It is not possible to index application data as each tenant stores different types of data in the same application table
Queries should be selective in terms of the number of records returned

span.em: Force.com integrates and optimizes several different data persistence technologies to deliver transparent polyglot persistence. Only a single API needs to be coded to, no matter which type of persistence is optimal for a given situation. The platform monitors queries and DML operations and throws a runtime exception if they exceed governor limits.

#text: Describe the considerations when developing in a multi-tenant environment.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: What is true regarding the Salesforce multitenant environment?

label.#text: All customizations are specified as metadata, allowing for easy upgrades
All customers share the same code base, but have their own database
Automatic upgrades are applied during the year according to the Salesforce release schedule to all customers
Metadata includes configuration but not code

span.em: All standard and custom configurations, functionality, and code in an org are metadata. These customizations are separated in a special metadata layer, so upgrades can easily be performed. These upgrades are released automatically three times a year for all customers.

p.em: In Salesforces multitenant environment, users share the same code base and database. Hence, governor limits are strictly imposed.

#text: Describe the considerations when developing in a multi-tenant environment.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: How does Salesforce track how a deal progresses through the sales cycle?

label.#text: Using Opportunity Status
Using Opportunity Stages
Using Sales Status
Using Deal Stages

span.em: In Salesforce, an opportunity moves through a series of stages defined within a sales process. The stages are linked to the type of tasks being performed and how likely it is that the sale will be made. Example stages include Prospecting, Developing, Negotiation/Review, Closed/Won, Closed/Lost.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

input.name: check

#text: Sarah has set up the standard Email-to-Case functionality and is testing it. She has found that cases are created from emails sent to the designated email address with the subject populated from the email subject and the case description populated from the email body. The support emails are sent using a standard format that includes the case priority and site location of the customer issue. How can these fields be set automatically when the case is created?

label.#text: Create an after trigger on the case object to update the case priority and site location fields
Create a custom email handler to map the fields
Add field mappings for custom priority and site location in the Email-to-Case settings
Create a workflow rule to update the case priority and site location fields

span.em: A custom email handler is required to parse the email and update the case priority and site location fields.

p.em: Email-to-Case can only map the email subject to the case subject and the email body to the case description. It is not possible to add further field mappings. Workflow rules and triggers are dependent on record changes in order to execute and cannot be used to handle inbound emails.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: There is a requirement to rate all accounts daily based on the value of opportunities closed in the last year. The account with the highest value of opportunities closed in the last year should be rated number 1, and so on until the account with the lowest value of closed opportunities. How could this requirement be achieved?

label.#text: Use Process Builder and schedule an action to run each night to sort and rate all accounts
Use a time-dependent workflow action to update the 'Rating' field
Use a Batch Apex job and schedule it to run each night
Use an Apex trigger on the Account object and schedule it to run each night

span.em: Process Builder, workflow rules, or triggers cannot be configured to run periodically at fixed timings or intervals. Apex would be required for this requirement since it can be scheduled to run at specific times or regular intervals, such as daily at a specific time.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

p: In this case, a batch Apex job can be used to process all account records at specific times. An Apex class that implements the Database.Batchable interface can be created for the batch Apex job. Another Apex class that implements the Schedulable interface can be created to execute the batch Apex job at regular intervals.
The Schedule Apex page in the Salesforce user interface or the System.schedule method can be used to specify the schedule.
The Apex class defined for the batch Apex job must use the following syntax:
The schedulable Apex class must use the following syntax:

pre.#text:
global class BatchApexClass implements Database.Batchable {
    global (Database.QueryLocator | Iterable

#text: If multiple people in an organization work with an account, how can this be easily tracked and the required access provided?

label.#text: Use Sharing Rules
Use Account Assignment Rules
Use Account Teams
Use Multiple Owners

span.em: An Account Team can be created for an account where team members can be assigned individual roles and access levels to the record including its related opportunities and cases.

p.em: Sharing rules are used to provide users specified access level to records that meet defined criteria. Account Assignment Rules do not exist. An account record can only have a single owner.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

#text: How can the relationship between different accounts be recorded and viewed?

label.#text: Using the Related Account field
Using the Parent Account field
Using the View Hierarchy link
Using the Generate Relationship function

span.em: If the Parent Account has been recorded for each account that has one, Salesforce can generate a family tree for the account using the View Hierarchy link.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

#text: Cosmic Solutions sells software and hardware solutions to various corporate clients. There are instances when a contact works as an IT consultant on behalf of multiple organizations. How can this be tracked in Salesforce?

label.#text: Use the Account Teams feature
Use the Contacts to Multiple Accounts feature
Create multiple contact records and relate the consultant to each organization they consult for
Use the Account Hierarchy feature

span.em: The Contacts to Multiple Accounts feature allows a single contact to be related to multiple accounts so that the relationships between people and businesses can be tracked without creating duplicate records. Every contact needs to be associated with a primary account. This is the account that appears in Account Name and is usually the company the contact is most closely associated with. Any other accounts associated with the contact represent indirect relationships.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

#text: A developer is required to ensure that a reason is entered if an opportunity stage is updated to 'Closed Lost'. What is the best way to meet this requirement?

label.#text: Workflow rule
Validation rule
Apex Trigger
Required field

span.em: A validation rule can be used to check both the stage and reason fields of an opportunity during the update. If the stage is set to Closed Lost and the reason field is empty, then the validation rule can display the error message.

p.em: The requirement can be met using a declarative tool, so there is no need to use an Apex trigger. A workflow rule cannot be used to validate field data. Setting the field to Required will require that field to be always populated regardless of the opportunity stage.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

#text: Which of the following are valid reasons for considering an AppExchange app?

label.#text: An existing app may solve the business problem, meaning a custom solution does not need to be developed
Many AppExchange apps include support for Salesforce mobile app
AppExchange apps will not affect organization limits
An existing unmanaged package app may meet most of the requirements and can be further customized
All AppExchange apps are free

span.em: Salesforce apps and components can be configured to explicitly support either desktop or phone only, or both, by specifying their supported form factors. While many AppExchange apps are free, the majority of apps require purchasing. Apps can either be managed or unmanaged packages, and overall limits are affected in different ways depending on the type of package.

#text: Which of the following are part of the model layer in the MVC model?

label.#text: Objects
Tabs
Page Layouts
Relationships
Fields

span.em: The model layer includes fields, objects, and relationships, whereas tabs and page layouts are part of the view layer.

#text: A Salesforce developer wants to build a custom user interface for internal users. The interface will contain fields pulled from different Salesforce objects, some of which are not related. Which is the most suitable solution in the given options?

label.#text: Develop an application using Heroku and embed it in the Salesforce org
Build a page using Dynamic Forms and Field Section Lightning components
Build a custom page layout in Salesforce containing the required information
Develop a Visualforce page to display fields from the different objects

span.em: Since the custom user interface is for internal use only and needs to pull in Salesforce data from different objects, a programmatic solution such as a Visualforce page or custom Lightning component is required.

p.em: A page layout cannot display fields from unrelated objects. Heroku is best used for customer-facing sites. Dynamic Forms and Field Section Lightning components are supported in Lightning record pages only and support fields that are related to the primary record.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

#text: What constitutes the Model part in the Model-View-Controller paradigm?

label.#text: Standard Objects
Visualforce Pages
Custom Objects
Standard Pages

span.em: The Model component constitutes the elements that define the structure of the data. In the Salesforce context, they are the standard and custom objects.

#text: Understand design frameworks, such as MVC architecture and Lightning Component framework, and how to build applications using both declarative and programmatic tools.

#text: Which of the following correctly describes how the platform features map to the MVC pattern?

label.#text: Model: Standard and Custom objects; View: CSS and images; Controller: Standard and Custom Controllers
Model: APEX Classes; View: Pages and Components; Controller: APEX Triggers
Model: Standard and Custom objects; View: Pages and Components; Controller: Standard and Custom Controllers
Model: Javascript code; View: Visualforce Pages; Controller: Custom APEX code

span.em: The MVC model is implemented with standard and custom objects. The view, or presentation layer, is comprised of Pages and components. The controller, or logic layer, includes any custom controller logic written in Apex as well as standard behavior generated by the Force.com platform for each object in standard controllers.

#text: Describe how the Salesforce platform features map to the MVC pattern.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: What is a valid consideration regarding development in a multi-tenant environment?

label.#text: Although Salesforce runs in the cloud, client software is still required
Salesforce organizations can choose to accept upgrades, so different organizations may be on different releases
Salesforce upgrades sandbox environments at the same time as production environments
Salesforce upgrades are automatic and cannot be scheduled on a particular date

span.em: Salesforce updates automatically 3 times a year and cannot be scheduled. No client software is required, apart from a browser to access the internet. Sandboxes are upgraded prior to production environments so that the changes can be previewed and tested.

#text: Describe the considerations when developing in a multi-tenant environment.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: Global Containers requires that when saving an opportunity record, a check is performed to determine if the opportunity amount is the highest value in the current year for all opportunities in the org. If so, a checkbox on the opportunity record should be marked and an email should be sent to the record owner's manager. What Salesforce feature should be recommended to handle this requirement?

label.#text: Flow Builder
Formula Field
Workflow Rule
Apex Trigger

span.em: A flow can be configured to launch when a record is saved and to query opportunities, determine if the record has the highest amount, and update a field on the record that invoked it if necessary. An Action element can be added to the flow, which can be used for sending emails.

p.em: Neither workflow rules nor formula fields can be used to meet this requirement.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

em.p: An Apex trigger could also achieve the desired result, but best practice is to build a declarative solution when possible.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Cosmic Solutions has a custom object called Weekly Employee Summary, which stores a summary of employee data that is tracked in Salesforce, such as hours worked and wage totals. An autolaunched flow has been built to calculate this information and create a new Weekly Employee Summary record for each employee every time it is run. Currently, a Salesforce Administrator needs to run this flow manually once a week. They would like this flow to be run automatically in the future. Which solutions would meet this requirement?

label.#text: Create a workflow rule that launches the flow weekly
Invoke the flow from an Apex job that runs weekly
Schedule the autolaunched flow to run weekly
Use Process Builder to invoke the flow to run weekly

span.em: The simplest solution is to invoke an autolaunched flow based on a schedule. Schedule-triggered flows can be configured to start on a specified date and time, with several frequency options. The scheduling configuration can be accessed by editing the flows Start node.

p.em: Process Builder and workflow rules cannot be scheduled to perform actions.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

em.p: A more complex solution would be to invoke the flow from an Apex class that implements the Schedulable interface, then schedule the class to run weekly.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: What are valid use cases for the AppExchange?

label.#text: To exchange apps with other developers
To extend standard Salesforce functionality
To add industry specific functionality to Salesforce
To exchange ideas and tips with other developers

span.em: The AppExchange can be used to add industry specific functionality such as Real Estate or to extend standard salesforce functionality e.g. calculate sales tax on a quote.

#text: Identify the common scenarios for extending an applications capabilities using the AppExchange.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: Which of the following use cases are valid for using declarative customization?

label.#text: Displaying the number of employees of the account related to an opportunity on the Opportunity page layout
Calculating the number of days until an opportunity closes and displaying the value on a report
Determining a lead rating that is based on the value of three fields on the lead record
Calculating the sales tax applicable to a quote that is a complex calculation based on factors such as product, state, and quantity
Displaying the total discount amount on an opportunity using a roll-up summary field based on line item formula fields which reference another object

span.em: The NumberOfEmployees field on the Account object can be displayed in the related Opportunity object using a cross-object formula field. The TODAY() function and an Opportunitys CloseDate field can be used in a formula to determine the number of days left leading to its close date in a custom field or row-level formula field in a report. Fields, functions, and operators can be used in a formula to generate certain output such as lead rating.

p.em: A complex calculation that involves a number of lookups would be too complex for a formula field and would need a programmatic solution. A flow could be used for a simple calculation but not when there is complex business logic involved. Cross-object formula fields cannot be used in roll-up summary fields.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

div.#text: Please select 3 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Which of the following are part of the control layer in the MVC model?

label.#text: List Views
Apps
Visualforce Controllers
Apex custom controllers

span.em: The control layer includes business logic either declarative (like workflow and escalation rules) or programmatic (like Visualforce controllers or Apex classes). The controller is responsible for responding to the user input and perform interactions on the data model objects. The controller receives the input, it validates the input and then performs the business operation that modifies the state of the data model.

#text: Understand design frameworks, such as MVC architecture and Lightning Component framework, and how to build applications using both declarative and programmatic tools.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Record types have been defined on the Account object. What does this mean?

label.#text: Different fields can be defined for each record type
Different page layouts can be assigned for each record type
Different users can be assigned to each record type
Different picklist values can be defined for each record type

span.em: Record types allow a different set of picklist values to be defined per record type, as well as different page layouts. Record types are assigned to profiles, not users.

#text: Describe the capabilities of the core CRM objects in the Salesforce schema.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: There is a requirement that when an opportunity is closed, commission records should be created automatically for each member of the opportunity team. The Commission custom object has a numeric field wherein its value is calculated based on the role of the member, time to close the deal, and type and value of the opportunity. How could this be achieved?

label.#text: Process Builder
Flow Builder
Workflow Rule
Apex Trigger

span.em: An auto-launched flow can be configured to automatically start when the opportunity is closed, create the commission records, as well as perform the logic required to compute the commission values.

p.em: Workflow rules cannot create records. Although Process Builder can be used to create a record, it is not capable of creating multiple records dynamically. An Apex trigger is not needed as the requirement can be met using a declarative solution.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: There is a requirement to validate that the country code of an account field is a valid ISO code. There are over 200 codes. What could be used for this validation?

label.#text: Before Update trigger
Validation Rule
After Update trigger
Workflow Rule

span.em: A validation rule can be used to ensure that the code entered is valid. In this particular scenario, the validation rule's formula field can contain a list of ISO codes with which to verify the country code.

p.em: There is no need for programmatic customization in this case as a declarative tool can meet the requirement. Workflow rules cannot be used to perform data validation.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: New Horizon Satellites uses Salesforce for opportunity management for its data service products. There are many variables and complex combinations that can be configured when offering a data service. The company currently uses Excel to produce quotes but would like to use Salesforce instead. What would be the recommended solution?

label.#text: Create a Visualforce page that displays the quote and allows saving it as a PDF
Create a custom button that allows exporting the opportunity details to Excel
Look for an AppExchange product that meets the requirements
Use Salesforce Quote-to-Cash functionality
Use the standard Quote template functionality

span.em: This requirement would be best met with a Configure / Price / Quote (CPQ) application. There are a number of applications available on the AppExchange which offer this functionality. Salesforce also offers CPQ functionality within the Quote-To-Cash product and may meet the requirement.

#text: Identify the common scenarios for extending an application\s capabilities using the AppExchange.

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: What are valid reasons for considering an AppExchange App?

label.#text: AppExchange apps can be installed by any Salesforce user
Some AppExchange apps are open source
AppExchange apps cover functionality not covered by Salesforce
AppExchange apps are isolated from other customizations, so they will not interfere with existing functionality
Some AppExchange apps are free

span.em: AppExchange apps can interfere with existing customizations, so they should be tested first in a sandbox. Only Salesforce Administrators and users with the Download AppExchange packages permission can install an AppExchange app.

#text: Identify the common scenarios for extending an applications capabilities using the AppExchange.

div.#text: Please select 3 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: A requirement has been given to display the average value of won opportunities on the Account page layout. How can this be best achieved?

label.#text: Use a trigger on the opportunity object
Use a trigger on the account object
Use roll-up summary fields and a formula field
Use a roll-up summary field with the average function

span.em: This requirement can be met by the completing the following configuration. A roll-up summary field is created that counts the number of won opportunities. Second, another roll-up summary field is created that sums the amount of won opportunities. Third, a new formula field is created that calculates the average. For example,   Total_Won_Amount__c / Total_Won_Count__c.

p.em: It is possible to create a trigger on the Account object, but it is not the best solution since the requirement can be achieved using declarative tools.

#text: Given a scenario, identify common use cases for declarative versus programmatic customizations.

em.p: Roll-up summary fields have the Count, Sum, Min and Max functions, but do not support the Average function.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: Which of the following best describe the Lightning Component framework?

label.#text: It has an event-driven architecture
It is device-aware and supports cross-browser compatibility
It automatically upgrades all pre-existing Visualforce pages and components
It requires the Aura Components model to build Lightning components

span.em: Lightning Component uses an event-driven architecture for better decoupling between components. Any component can subscribe to an application event, or to a component event they can see. The Lightning Component framework supports the latest in browser technology such as HTML5, CSS3, and touch events and includes responsive components.

p.em: Converting Visualforce pages and components to Lightning components requires manual work. Aside from the Aura Components model, the Lightning Web Component model can also be used to build Lightning components.

#text: Describe the benefits of the Lightning Component Framework

div.#text: Please select 2 answers for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; display: none; margin-left: -10px;

#text: What is correct in respect to the Salesforce MVC paradigm?

label.#text: Custom Objects are part of MVC
Standard pages are part of MVC
Visualforce pages are part of MVC
All Statements are true
Components are part of MVC

span.em: Custom objects are part of the model in MVC, and standard and Visualforce pages are part of the View component.

#text: Describe how the Salesforce platform features map to the MVC pattern.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Cosmic Transport would like to use the Lightning Component Framework for adding functionality that allows the company's users to manage its transportation services. A developer has been asked to work on a few custom Lightning web components that will be added to Lightning pages and tabs. Which of the following is an important consideration for this use case?

label.#text: Each Lightning web component should be inside an Aura component to configure it using Lightning App Builder.
A component bundle containing Controller and CSS would need to be defined for each Lightning web component.
My Domain will need to be deployed for adding the components to Lightning pages and tabs.
The Lightning Component Framework allows only Aura components to be added to Lightning tabs.

span.em: The Lightning Component Framework allows both Aura and Lightning web component to be added to Lightning pages and tabs. However, My Domain needs to be deployed if Lightning components need to be used in Lightning tabs, Lightning pages, as standalone apps, as actions and action overrides, as custom Lightning page templates, or elsewhere in the org. A component bundle can only be defined for an Aura component. Each Lightning web component that renders UI consists of an HTML file, a JavaScript file, and a metadata configuration file. A Lightning web component does not need to be inside an Aura component in order to configure it using Lightning App Builder.

#text: Understand design frameworks, such as MVC architecture and Lightning Component framework, and how to build applications using both declarative and programmatic tools.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;

#text: Cosmic Solutions would like to generate invoices in Salesforce, allow customers to pay their invoice securely from their email, and process the payment. Which of the following should be used to meet this requirement?

label.#text: Check if an AppExchange app exists
Use Lightning Process Builder
Build a custom Apex solution
Use Workflow Rule and Formula Fields

span.em: In this case, it would be better to look for an existing AppExchange app that offers the functionality required by the company. Native features in Salesforce, such as Process Builder, Workflow Rule, and Formula Fields, cannot be used for allowing customers to pay from their email and processing their payment. Several free solutions that offer features related to payment processing are available in the AppExchange, which makes using an existing app a better option than committing resources for the development of a custom application that uses Apex code.

#text: Identify the common scenarios for extending an application\s capabilities using the AppExchange.

div.#text: Please select 1 answer for this question.

input.name: check
input.style: float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: -10px; display: none;
